entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
